fields.fieldText: Select a Borrower.

value.stringValue: Select or add a source of other monthly income to edit its information

textTemplates.name: AddEmployerChoiceHelpText
textTemplates.text: Employer includes each job, self-employment, or business you own.

textTemplates.name: AddEmployerChoiceText
textTemplates.text: Do you want to add an employer?

textTemplates.name: AddIncomeChoiceHelpText
textTemplates.text: Other monthly income includes alimony, capital gains, disability, social security, and other non-employment sources of income.

textTemplates.name: AddIncomeChoiceText
textTemplates.text: Do you want to add a source of other monthly income?
